title: Community Mktg/Customer Relations Mktg Intern - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Community Mktg/Customer Relations Mktg Intern College Sports   You will be one of the first faces and smiles our customers see as you represent our team, many of them for the first time. You will be trained and equipped with information to answer questions...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
